effect.en: As often as you like during your turn, you may move an Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your Rapid Strike Pokémon.
effect.fr: Autant de fois que vous le voulez pendant votre tour, vous pouvez déplacer une Énergie de l'un de vos Pokémon vers l'un de vos Pokémon Mille Poings.
effect.es: Todas las veces que quieras durante tu turno, puedes mover 1 Energía de 1 de tus Pokémon a 1 de tus Pokémon Golpe Fluido.
effect.it: Durante il tuo turno, puoi spostare un'Energia da uno dei tuoi Pokémon a uno dei tuoi Pokémon Colpo Rapido tutte le volte che vuoi.
effect.pt: As often as you like during your turn, you may move an Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your Rapid Strike Pokémon.
effect.de: Beliebig oft während deines Zuges kannst du 1 Energie von 1 deiner Pokémon auf 1 deiner Fließender-Angriff-Pokémon verschieben.

effect.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
effect.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est maintenant Confus.
effect.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival pasa a estar Confundido.
effect.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario viene confuso.
effect.pt: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
effect.de: Das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners ist jetzt verwirrt.

description.en: Its life can span several hundred years. It's said to devote its entire life to protecting gardens.
